service.name: Patient Management System
service.description: The Patient Management System (PMS) is a central system to manage patients and their treatment during their stay in your facility. Comfortably organize your patients, their diagnosis, medications and parameters by using the PMS. Archive patients to later review their files when they are retaken to your hospital. Share patients with other hospitals to obtain a more precise course of their diseases.

path.desc: View a patients file, his diagnosis, blood pressures, medication and p.r.n. his operations.
Edit a patients file, in case a new diagnosis was made or an operation was ordered.
Add or modify a patient's list of blood pressures.
Add or modify a medicament to a patient's medication.
View details of a certain operation.
Add, modify or cancel an operation.
Search the archive for old patient files.
Delete a blood pressure entry permanently.
Obtain and modify the profile of the service user.
Obtain the booking page to add or modify the options the service user booked.
